c1.name: Whimsical Wonders
c1.descriptionRaw:
Lyney can have 2 <color=#FFD780FF>Grin-Malkin Hats</color> present at once.
Additionally, Prop Arrows will summon 2 Grin-Malkin Hats and grant Lyney 1 extra stack of Prop Surplus. This effect can occur once every 15s.
c1.description:
Lyney can have 2 Grin-Malkin Hats present at once.
Additionally, Prop Arrows will summon 2 Grin-Malkin Hats and grant Lyney 1 extra stack of Prop Surplus. This effect can occur once every 15s.

c2.name: Loquacious Cajoling
c2.descriptionRaw: When Lyney is on the field, he will gain a stack of Crisp Focus every 2s. Each stack will increase his CRIT DMG by 20%. Max 3 stacks. This effect will be canceled when Lyney leaves the field.
c2.description: When Lyney is on the field, he will gain a stack of Crisp Focus every 2s. Each stack will increase his CRIT DMG by 20%. Max 3 stacks. This effect will be canceled when Lyney leaves the field.

c3.name: Prestidigitation
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack: Card Force Translocation</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Normal Attack: Card Force Translocation by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Well-Versed, Well-Rehearsed
c4.descriptionRaw: After an opponent is hit by Lyney's <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color> Charged Attack, this opponent's <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color> will be decreased by 20% for 6s.
c4.description: After an opponent is hit by Lyney's Pyro Charged Attack, this opponent's Pyro RES will be decreased by 20% for 6s.

c5.name: To Pierce Enigmas
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Guarded Smile
c6.descriptionRaw: When Lyney fires a <color=#FFD780FF>Prop Arrow</color>, he will fire a Pyrotechnic Strike: Reprised that will deal 80% of a Pyrotechnic Strike's DMG. This DMG is considered Charged Attack DMG.
c6.description: When Lyney fires a Prop Arrow, he will fire a Pyrotechnic Strike: Reprised that will deal 80% of a Pyrotechnic Strike's DMG. This DMG is considered Charged Attack DMG.
